name: Basic Package
description: Perfect for a night out or special occasion. Includes expert makeup application and basic hair styling.

name: Premium Package
description: Full glam transformation with premium products, advanced techniques, and complete hair styling.

name: Bridal Package
description: Make your special day perfect with our comprehensive bridal beauty service including trials and day-of styling.

name: Group Package
description: Perfect for bridal parties or special events. Includes styling for up to 4 people.

name: Photoshoot Package
description: Camera-ready makeup and hair styling optimized for photography and video.

name: Makeup Class
description: Learn professional makeup techniques in a private one-on-one session.

name: Monthly Beauty Box
description: Monthly subscription box with curated beauty products and exclusive tips.

name: Quarterly Glam Box
description: Premium quarterly subscription with full-size products and seasonal beauty guides.
